author: Peter D. Turney
title: Cost-Sensitive Classification: Empirical Evaluation of a Hybrid Genetic Decision Tree Induction Algorithm
window: test costs has some limitations. As it is TURNEY 398 currently implemented, it does not handle the cost of attributes that are calculated from other attributes. For example, in the Thyroid dataset (Appendix A.5), the FTI test is calculated based on the results of the TT4 and T4U tests. If the FTI test is selected, we must pay for the TT4 and T4U tests.
